info.title: Agent Lab API
info.description: Containerized web service platform for building and orchestrating agentic workflows.

get.description: Returns a paginated list of agents with optional filtering and sorting

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Comma-separated sort fields. Prefix with - for descending

post.description: Validates and stores a new agent configuration
Search agents with filters and pagination via POST body
Execute agent chat completion with SSE streaming

200.description: SSE stream of chat response chunks

post.description: Execute agent with tool calling capabilities

images.description: Image file (multiple supported via repeated field)

post.description: Execute agent vision analysis with SSE streaming

images.description: Image file (multiple supported via repeated field)

200.description: SSE stream of vision analysis chunks

get.description: List documents with pagination and optional filters

post.description: Upload a document file with optional display name. PDFs have page count extracted automatically.
Search documents with pagination in request body

delete.description: Delete document and its stored file

get.description: List rendered images with optional filters and pagination

post.description: Render document pages to images. Supports batch rendering with page range expressions (e.g., '1-5,10,15-20'). Currently supports PDF files.

get.description: Find metadata for a rendered image

delete.description: Delete a rendered image from storage and database

get.description: Get the raw binary data for a rendered image
Returns a paginated list of workflow profiles with optional filtering

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Comma-separated sort fields. Prefix with - for descending

get.description: Returns a profile with all its stage configurations

delete.description: Deletes a profile and all its stage configurations

post.description: Creates or updates a stage configuration for a profile (save)

delete.description: Removes a stage configuration from a profile

get.description: Returns a paginated list of providers with optional filtering and sorting

parameters.name: sort
parameters.description: Comma-separated sort fields. Prefix with - for descending

post.description: Validates and stores a new provider configuration
Search providers with filters and pagination via POST body

get.description: Returns all workflows registered in the system
Returns paginated list of workflow runs with optional filters
Returns details for a specific workflow run

delete.description: Deletes a workflow run and its related data (stages, decisions, checkpoints)

get.description: Returns routing decisions for a workflow run

post.description: Resumes a failed or cancelled workflow run from checkpoint

get.description: Returns execution stages for a workflow run

post.description: Executes a workflow and streams progress events via SSE

config.description: go-agents AgentConfig as JSON (includes embedded provider config)

token.description: Auth token for agent API calls (not persisted)

sort.description: Comma-separated sort fields. Prefix with - for descending. Example: name,-created_at

force.description: Re-render even if matching image exists

pages.description: Page range expression (e.g., '1-5,10,15-20'). Omit to render all pages.

quality.description: JPEG quality (1-100, only applies to jpg format)
